ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Has feeling bored made you brood about your shape?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you been so worried about your shape that you have been feeling that you ought to diet?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you thought that your thighs, hips or bottom are too large for the rest of you?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you been afraid that you might become fat (or fatter)?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you worried about your flesh not being firm enough?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Has feeling full (e.g., after eating a large meal) made you feel fat?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you felt so bad about your shape that you have cried?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you avoided running because your flesh might wobble?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Has being with thin women made you feel self-conscious about your shape?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you worried about your thighs spreading out when sitting down?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Has eating even a small amount of food made you feel fat?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you noticed the shape of other women and felt that your own shape compared unfavorably?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Has thinking about your shape interfered with your ability to concentrate (e.g., while watching television, reading, listening to conversations)?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Has being naked, such as when you take a bath, made you feel fat?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you avoided wearing clothes which make you particularly aware of the shape of your body?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you imagined cutting off fleshy areas of your body?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Has eating sweets, or other high calorie foods made you feel fat?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you not gone out to social occasions (e.g., parties) because you have felt bad about your shape?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you felt excessively large and rounded?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you felt ashamed of your body?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Has worry about your shape made you diet?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you felt happiest about your shape when your stomach has been empty (e.g., in the morning)?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you thought that you are the shape you are because you lack self-control?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you worried about other people seeing rolls of flesh around your waist or stomach?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you felt that it is not fair that other women are thinner than you?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you vomited in order to feel thinner?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: When in company have you worried about taking up too much room (e.g., sitting on the sofa or a bus seat)?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have your worried about your flesh being dimply?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Has seeing your reflection (e.g., in a mirror or shop window) made you feel bad about your shape?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you pinched areas of your body to see how much fat there is?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you avoided situations where people could see your body (e.g., communal changing rooms or swimming baths)?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you taken laxatives in order to feel thinner?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Have you been particularly self-conscious about your shape when in the company of other people?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Has worry about your shape made you feel you ought to exercise?
Notes: 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Very Often; 6 = Always

ElementDescription: Body Shape Questionnaire Total Score
Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: Was the form completed?
Notes: 1=Yes; 2=No; 3=Unverified; 4 = N/A-Not in age range

ElementDescription: Visit name
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2, Daily

ElementDescription: Visit type
Notes: 1=Phone/remote; 0=doctor's office/In person; 2=No, not phone interview

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime
